name: Lemon Balm Lavender Tisane
description: Lemon balm is a member of the mint family, but its bright, lemony scent is immediately recognizable and makes a super-refreshing iced tisane.
recipeIngredient: 6 sprigs fresh lavender leaves, plus more for garnish if desired
6 sprigs lemon balm, plus more for garnish if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lavender and lemon balm in a large heatproof container. Pour boiling water over the herbs and let steep for 15 minutes. Pour through a fine mesh strainer into a second heatproof container. Discard solids.
Let cool to room temperature then refrigerate until cold. Serve in ice-filled glasses, garnished with a small sprig of fresh lemon balm and lavender if desired.
